snippet.title: Lucid Heist Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Download game here: https://kindafiction.itch.io/lucidheist
🐦 www.twitter.com/kindafiction
📷 www.instagram.com/kindafiction

✨Good artists copy, great artists steal ✨ 

A tiny game about Mia , an artist who suffers from severe artist blocks. She often dives into dreams to steal inspirations. 

Find and steal the art. Avoid or fight the guards. Plan your escape with the emergency exit door. 

Made with ❤️ Agatha Yu
